Verses: 1 kollaiyidappadaadhirundhum, Kollaiyidugiravanum, Dhrogampannaadhirukkiravargalukku Dhrogampannugiravanumaagiya Unakku Aiyo! Nee Kollaiyittu Mudindhapinbu Kollaiyidappaduvaai; Nee Dhrogampannith Theerndhapinbu Unakku Dhrogampannuvaargal.
2 karththaave, Engalukku Irangum, Umakkuk Kaaththirukkirom; Dhevareer Kaalaiyil Avargal Buyamum, Ikkattukkaalaththil Engal Ratchippumaayirum.
3 amaliyin Saththaththinaale Janangal Alaindhodi, Neer Ezhundhirukkumpodhu Jaadhigal Sidharadikkappaduvaargal.
4 vettukkiligal Serkkiradhupola Ungal Kollai Serkkappadum; Vettukkiligal Kudhiththuththirigiradhupola Manushar Adhinmel Kudhiththuth Thirivaargal.
5 karththar Uyarndhavar, Avar Unnadhaththil Vaasamaayirukkiraar; Avar Seeyonai Nyaayaththinaalum Needhiyinaalum Nirappugiraar.
6 pooranaratchippum Gnaanamum Arivum Un Kaalangaludaiya Urudhiyaayirukkum; Karththarukku Bayappadudhale Adhin Pokkisham.
7 idho, Avarudaiya Paraakkiramasaaligal Veliyile Alarugiraargal; Samaadhaanaththu Sthaanaapadhigal Manankasandhu Azhugiraargal.
8 paadhaigal Paazhaayina; Vazhippokkar Illai; Udanpadikkaiyai Meerugiraan; Nagarangalai Igazhchchipannugiraan; Manushanai Ennaadhepogiraan.
9 dhesam Dhukkiththu Vidaaiththirukkiradhu; Leebanon Vetki Vaadugiradhu, Saaron Vanaandharaththukku Oppaagiradhu; Paasaanum Karmelum Paazhaakkappadugiradhu.
10 ippozhudhu Ezhundharuluven, Ippozhudhu Uyaruven, Ippozhudhu Menmaippaduven Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.
11 padharaik Karppandhariththuth Thaaladiyaip Peruveergal; Akkiniyaippol Ungal Suvaasame Ungalaippatchikkum.
12 janangal Sunnaambaippola Neetrappaduvaargal; Vettappatta Mutchedigalaippolath Theeyil Erikkappaduvaargal.
13 dhooraththilullavargale, Naan Seygiradhaik Kelungal; Sameebaththilirukkiravargale En Paraakkiramaththai Arindhukollungal Engiraar.

14 seeyonilulla Paavigal Thigaikkiraargal; Maayakkaararai Nadukkam Pidikkiradhu; Patchikkum Akkinikku Munbaaga Nammil Thariththiruppavan Yaar? Niththiya Juvaalaikku Munbaaga Nammil Thaabarippavan Yaar Engiraargal.

15 needhiyaai Nadandhu, Semmaiyaanavaigalaip Pesi, Idukkan Seyvadhaal Varum Aadhaayaththai Veruththu, Paridhaanangalai Vaangaadhapadikkuth Than Kaigalai Udhari, Raththanchindhuvadharkaana Yosanaigalaik Kelaadhapadikkuth Than Seviyai Adaiththu, Pollaappaik Kaanaadhapadikkuth Than Kangalai Moodugiravanevano,
16 avan Uyarndha Idangalil Vaasampannuvaan; Kanmalaigalin Arangal Avanudaiya Uyarndha Adaikkalamaagum; Avan Appam Avanukkuk Kodukkappadum; Avan Thanneer Avanukku Nichchayamaaik Kidaikkum.
17 un Kangal Raajaavai Magimai Porundhinavaraagak Kaanum, Dhooraththilulla Dhesaththaiyum Paarkkum.
18 un Manam Bayangaraththai Ninaivukoorum; Kanakkan Enge? Thandalkaaran Enge? Koburangalai Enninavan Enge?
19 unakku Vilangaadha Baashaiyaiyum, Aridharkariya Oruvidhamaana Pechchaiyumudaiya Andhak Kuroora Janangalai Ini Nee Kaanaai.

20 nammudaiya Pandigaigal Aasarikkappadum Nagaramaagiya Seeyonai Nokkippaar; Un Kangal Erusalemai Amarikkaiyaana Thaabaramaagavum, Peyarkkappadaadha Koodaaramaagavum Kaanum; Ini Adhin Mulaigal Endraikkum Pidungappaduvadhumillai, Adhin Kayirugalil Ondrum Arundhu Povadhumillai.
21 magimaiyulla Karththar Ange Namakku Magaa Visaalamaana Nadhigalum Aarugalumulla Sthalampoliruppaar; Valikkira Padavu Ange Oduvadhum Illai, Periya Kappal Ange Kadandhuvaruvadhum Illai.
22 karththar Nammudaiya Nyaayaadhipadhi, Karththar Nammudaiya Nyaayappramaanigar, Karththar Nammudaiya Raajaa, Avar Nammai Ratchippaar.
23 un Kayirugal Thalarndhupom; Paaimaraththaik Kettippaduththavum Paayai Virikkavun Koodaamarpom; Appozhudhu Thiralaana Kollaipporul Pangidappadum; Sappaanigalum Kollaiyaaduvaargal.
24 vyaadhippattirukkiren Endru Nagaravaasigal Solvadhillai; Adhil Vaasamaayirukkira Janaththin Akkiramam Mannikkappattirukkum.
